small.comment: Determines how far down from the top of the page the Modal renders at the small breakpoint.

medium.comment: Determines how far down from the top of the page the Modal renders at the medium breakpoint.

mask-color.comment: The color of the mask overlay that is shown behind the Modal.

color.comment: The background color of the Modal.

max-width.comment: The maximum width of the Modal.

height.comment: The maximum height of the Modal.

shadow.comment: The box shadow on the Modal.

border-radius.comment: The border radius on the Modal.
